cards.rules_text:
Timestream {1}{W}{U} [i](If you cast this for its timestream cost, it phases out when it enters and doesn't phase in during your next turn.)[/i]
Flying, vigilance
Whenever you put one or more counters on a permanent you control, you draw a card and you lose 1 life. This ability triggers only once each turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Chaza, Teferi's island refuge in the Jaema Sea, attracts novice wizards eager to learn under the chronomancer's tutelage.[/i]

cards.rules_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gains deathtouch and lifelink until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The scrubland surrounding Aku is deeply tainted with the presence of its ancient master.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Amass Soldiers 3. When you do, target creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the amassed Army's power. [i](To Amass Soldiers 3, put three +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a Soldier. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Soldier Army creature token first.)[/i]
Each creature you control that's attacking a battle can't be blocked by more than one creature.
cards.flavor_text: [i]High up in the trees, where its feet will never touch the ground, the nkishi lurks, waiting for the scent of battle to whet its appetite anew.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Timestream {1}{G}{U} [i](If you cast this for its timestream cost, it phases out when it enters and doesn't phase in during your next turn.)[/i]
When Chaza Guardian enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life and draw a card, then you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 colorless Drake artifact creature token with flying.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Richly furnished with gold from the mountain mines, the sculptors and artisans of Femeref worked devotional wonders for the Council of Voices.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Lifelink
Whenever Solitary Hunter attacks, target creature you control gains menace until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“When you watch out for the leopard, remember that the snake knows you are busy.”
—Afari, [/i]Tales[i][/i]

cards.rules_text:
Double strike
Whenever a creature you control phases in, put a +1/+1 counter on Scourge of Ekundu.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“The leopard does not change his spots, but the tiger is not so stubborn.”
—Afari, [/i]Tales[i][/i]

cards.rules_text: Whenever Kaervek's Breathstealer deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more counters on it, you may return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Feed yourself only on the sword, and all your words will be blood.”
—Zhalfirin aphorism[/i]

cards.rules_text: Whenever Risen Mundungu outflanks, create a tapped 1/1 white Warrior creature token. [i](A creature outflanks when instructed to or when it attacks and isn't blocked by creatures with equal or greater total power.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]The stewards of the Pillar Tombs stand guard eternal.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0 and have trample.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Ufunguo was only the first settlement to fall to the lord of the Burning Isles. With every battle, his legion of shades and wretches grew bolder and larger.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flying
Whenever you put one or more +1/+1 counters on an Army you control, you may put that many +1/+1 counters on Mtenda Griffin. Do this only once each turn.
Whenever Kaervek's Emissary attacks, other attacking creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The lord of the Burning Isles has long planned for greatness, seeding Jamuraa with catspaws and spies ahead of his marching army.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Vigilance, trample
Whenever you cast a spell with mana value greater than Child of Mutoto's power, put two +1/+1 counters on Child of Mutoto.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The soul of Uktabi is never alone.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards. Noncreature spells you cast this way cost {1} less to cast.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The holy avenger knew that peace was inevitable—but at what cost?[/i]

cards.rules_text: Whenever Femeref Outrider outflanks, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. [i](A creature outflanks when instructed to or when it attacks and isn't blocked by creatures with equal or greater total power.)[/i]

Whenever Hand of the Sidar outflanks, return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. [i](A creature outflanks when instructed to or when it attacks and isn't blocked by creatures with equal or greater total power.)[/i]

[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You can attack it)[/i]
When The Rally of Quirion enters the battlefield or is defeated, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. When you do, The Rally of Quirion deals damage to target opponent equal to the number of basic lands you control.

[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You can attack it)[/i]
When The Song of Uktabi enters the battlefield or is defeated, return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
